nodes.text: BB-8 Finds a Friend is a Star Wars young-readers title in the World of Reading Level 1 series. It was written by Nate Millici, illustrated by Pilot Studio, and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on October 25, 2016. The book's story adapts astromech droid BB-8's first encounter with the scavenger Rey from the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. BB-8 Finds a Friend was released exclusively as part of World of Reading Star Wars Boxed Set: Level 1.
